name: market-data
description: Source market data from 3rd party providers with a typescript function
author: Robert Cicero

scripts.compile: export NODE_ENV=prod && npm run clean && tsc && npm run post-build
scripts.post-build: cpx package.json built/ && cpx ormconfig.js built/ && cp -R node_modules/ built/node_modules/
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=dev && npm run compile && node -e 'require("./built/app").lambdaHandler({"pair": "AUD/USD"})'
